show_name.description: Human friendly name of the show.

season.description: Optional default season number when unspecified elsewhere.

cast_members.description: Canonical cast definitions used for name validation and correction.

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence required to auto-apply a correction.

auto_correct_names.description: Enable automatic name corrections when confidence threshold is met.

enabled.description: Master toggle for the name correction subsystem.

auto_correct_threshold.description: Confidence value required to automatically apply a suggestion.

fuzzy_match_cutoff.description: Similarity score required for fuzzy matches to be considered.

case_sensitive.description: If true, matching retains original casing instead of lower-casing.

preserve_formatting.description: If true, preserves the source capitalization when applying corrections.

prompt_on_ambiguous.description: If true, ambiguous matches below threshold should be surfaced to the user.

log_corrections.description: Persist automated corrections to the name_corrections_log table.

transcription_prompt.description: Optional initial prompt supplied to the ASR model for additional context.

notes.description: Free-form notes about this show configuration.

canonical_name.description: Canonical spelling used throughout transcripts and UI.

common_misspellings.description: Frequently observed misspellings to correct automatically.

aliases.description: Alternative names or nicknames for matching.

role.description: Role classification used for UI filtering.

notes.description: Optional metadata or reminders about this cast member.
